title: Understanding the Interaction Between Team Learning and Organizational Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic organizational behavior theory and learning theories, with team project experience
context.additional_context: Learners must analyze team learning mechanisms based on real-world workplace cases and apply them to organizational learning system design

learning_goals: Learners can derive three core theories explaining the linkage between team learning processes and organizational learning through literature analysis.
Learners can evaluate the impact of dynamic team learning models on organizational performance based on real industry case studies.
Learners can apply five key elements (autonomy, goal clarity, knowledge-sharing channels, etc.) to team projects when designing team learning routines.

resources: Compilation of Academic Papers on Team Learning

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
